languages.text: "Лорд-капитан! Дозвольте еще раз изъявить свою благодарность за вашу помощь. Если бы не ваше вмешательство..." {n}Абеляр потрясенно качает головой.{/n} "...я мог бы лишиться всей своей семьи, казненной по ложному обвинению! Я и не представлял, насколько уязвимы Версерианы, когда я — сенешаль само{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана — вдали от дома".

"Lord Captain! Allow me to express my gratitude once again for your assistance. If it weren't for your intervention..." {n}Abelard shakes his head in shock.{/n} "My entire family could have been executed on false charges! I could have lost them all! I never imagined the Werserians would be so vulnerable while I serve as Seneschal to the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} — far from home."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан! Дозвольте еще раз изъявить свою благодарность за вашу помощь. Если бы не ваше вмешательство..." {n}Абеляр потрясенно качает головой.{/n} "...я мог бы лишиться всей своей семьи, казненной по ложному обвинению! Я и не представлял, насколько уязвимы Версерианы, когда я — сенешаль само{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана — вдали от дома".

If it weren't for your intervention..." {n}Abelard shakes his head in shock.{/n} "My entire family could have been executed on false charges! I could have lost them all! I never imagined the Werserians would be so vulnerable while I serve as Seneschal to the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} — far from home."

If it weren't for your intervention..." {n}Abelard shakes his head in shock.{/n} "My entire family could have been executed on false charges! I could have lost them all! I never imagined the Werserians would be so vulnerable while I serve as Seneschal to the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} — far from home."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «¡Lord Capitán! Permítame expresarle mi gratitud una vez más por su ayuda. De no haber sido por su intervención...». {n}Abelard menea la cabeza, sin dar crédito.{/n} «¡Toda mi familia habría sido ejecutada por una acusación falsa! ¡Los habría perdido a todos! Nunca imaginé que los Werserian serían tan vulnerables mientras yo servía como senescal {mf|del mismísimo|de la mismísima} Lord Capitán, tan lejos de mi hogar».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! Allow me to express my gratitude once again for your assistance. If it weren't for your intervention..." {n}Abelard shakes his head in shock.{/n} "My entire family could have been executed on false charges! I could have lost them all! I never imagined the Werserians would be so vulnerable while I serve as Seneschal to the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} — far from home."

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Capitán! Permítame expresarle mi gratitud una vez más por su ayuda. De no haber sido por su intervención...». {n}Abelard menea la cabeza, sin dar crédito.{/n} «¡Toda mi familia habría sido ejecutada por una acusación falsa! ¡Los habría perdido a todos! Nunca imaginé que los Werserian serían tan vulnerables mientras yo servía como senescal {mf|del mismísimo|de la mismísima} Lord Capitán, tan lejos de mi hogar».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン！ ご尽力いただき、改めてお礼を申し上げたいと思います。あなたがいなければ…」{n}アベラルドは驚いたように首を横に振った。{/n}「私の家族全員が冤罪で処刑されていたかもしれません！ 全員殺されていたかもしれないのです！ 私が故郷から遠く離れ、ロード・キャプテンの家令長として仕えている間にウェルザリアン家がこのような脆弱な状態になるとは思いもしませんでした」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! Allow me to express my gratitude once again for your assistance. If it weren't for your intervention..." {n}Abelard shakes his head in shock.{/n} "My entire family could have been executed on false charges! I could have lost them all! I never imagined the Werserians would be so vulnerable while I serve as Seneschal to the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} — far from home."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン！ ご尽力いただき、改めてお礼を申し上げたいと思います。あなたがいなければ…」{n}アベラルドは驚いたように首を横に振った。{/n}「私の家族全員が冤罪で処刑されていたかもしれません！ 全員殺されていたかもしれないのです！ 私が故郷から遠く離れ、ロード・キャプテンの家令長として仕えている間にウェルザリアン家がこのような脆弱な状態になるとは思いもしませんでした」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人！请允许我再次对您的帮助表示感谢。如果不是由于您的介入……”{n}阿贝拉德震惊地摇了摇头。{/n}“我的整个家族，都可能会因莫须有的指控遭到处决！我可能会彻底失去我的家人！我从来都没有想过，当我远离故土，担任舰长大人的总领时，韦尔森家族会变得如此脆弱。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! Allow me to express my gratitude once again for your assistance. If it weren't for your intervention..." {n}Abelard shakes his head in shock.{/n} "My entire family could have been executed on false charges! I could have lost them all! I never imagined the Werserians would be so vulnerable while I serve as Seneschal to the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} — far from home."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人！请允许我再次对您的帮助表示感谢。如果不是由于您的介入……”{n}阿贝拉德震惊地摇了摇头。{/n}“我的整个家族，都可能会因莫须有的指控遭到处决！我可能会彻底失去我的家人！我从来都没有想过，当我远离故土，担任舰长大人的总领时，韦尔森家族会变得如此脆弱。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Permettez-moi d'exprimer à nouveau ma gratitude pour votre aide. Sans votre intervention... toute ma famille aurait pu être exécutée sur la base de fausses accusations ! {n}s'exclame Abélard en secouant la tête d'un air choqué.{/n} J'aurais pu les perdre jusqu'au dernier ! Je n'avais jamais imaginé que les Werserian pourraient être aussi vulnérables pendant que je servais {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} loin de chez moi. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! Allow me to express my gratitude once again for your assistance. If it weren't for your intervention..." {n}Abelard shakes his head in shock.{/n} "My entire family could have been executed on false charges! I could have lost them all! I never imagined the Werserians would be so vulnerable while I serve as Seneschal to the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} — far from home."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Permettez-moi d'exprimer à nouveau ma gratitude pour votre aide. Sans votre intervention... toute ma famille aurait pu être exécutée sur la base de fausses accusations ! {n}s'exclame Abélard en secouant la tête d'un air choqué.{/n} J'aurais pu les perdre jusqu'au dernier ! Je n'avais jamais imaginé que les Werserian pourraient être aussi vulnérables pendant que je servais {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} loin de chez moi. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain! Gestattet mir, erneut meinem Dank für Eure Unterstützung Ausdruck zu verleihen. Ohne Eure Intervention ..." {n}Abelard schüttelt entsetzt den Kopf.{/n} "Ohne Euch hätte meine ganze Familie aufgrund falscher Anschuldigungen hingerichtet werden können! Ich hätte sie alle verlieren können! Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass die Werserians so verletzlich sind, während ich dem Lord Captain persönlich als Truchsess diene, fernab der Heimat."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! Allow me to express my gratitude once again for your assistance. If it weren't for your intervention..." {n}Abelard shakes his head in shock.{/n} "My entire family could have been executed on false charges! I could have lost them all! I never imagined the Werserians would be so vulnerable while I serve as Seneschal to the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} — far from home."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain! Gestattet mir, erneut meinem Dank für Eure Unterstützung Ausdruck zu verleihen. Ohne Eure Intervention ..." {n}Abelard schüttelt entsetzt den Kopf.{/n} "Ohne Euch hätte meine ganze Familie aufgrund falscher Anschuldigungen hingerichtet werden können! Ich hätte sie alle verlieren können! Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass die Werserians so verletzlich sind, während ich dem Lord Captain persönlich als Truchsess diene, fernab der Heimat."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! Allow me to express my gratitude once again for your assistance. If it weren't for your intervention..." {n}Abelard shakes his head in shock.{/n} "My entire family could have been executed on false charges! I could have lost them all! I never imagined the Werserians would be so vulnerable while I serve as Seneschal to the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} — far from home."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan! Yardımınıza minnettar olduğumu bir kez daha belirtmeme müsaade edin. Siz araya girmeseydiniz..." {n}Abelard, sarsılmış bir hâlde başını iki yana sallıyor.{/n} "Tüm ailem, iftiralara kurban gidecekti! Kimsesiz kalacaktım! Ben evden ırak topraklarda Lord Kaptan'a hizmet ederken Werserian hanesinin bu denli korumasız olacağı aklımın ucundan geçmezdi."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! Allow me to express my gratitude once again for your assistance. I never imagined the Werserians would be so vulnerable while I serve as Seneschal to the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} — far from home."

Ben evden ırak topraklarda Lord Kaptan'a hizmet ederken Werserian hanesinin bu denli korumasız olacağı aklımın ucundan geçmezdi."
